data.title: From Cerbère to Barcelona by Train from €18.90
data.meta_description: Travel from Cerbère (France) to Barcelona (Spain) by train (144km): schedule and information to the train connection. Compare fares and buy your ticket.
data.text:
1a Travelling from Cerbère (France) to Barcelona (Spain)

To travel by train from France to Spain, use first one of the direct high-speed-trains from France (Paris) or southern France (Marseille) to Barcelona. There you change to your destination in Spain.

Another option is to cross the border at Irun/Hendaye and to continue from there to your destination in Spain. Some routes run via Latour-de-Carol.

Find train schedules, ticket fares and the best routes via the given booking links.

In some cases you have to buy two tickets. One from France to Barcelona (Spain) and a second one from Barcelona to your destination in Spain. Book early to get discounts and saver fares.

2a Travelling from Cerbère (France) to Irun (Spain)

To travel by train from France to Spain, use first one of the direct high-speed-trains from France (Paris) or southern France (Marseille) to Barcelona. There you change to your destination in Spain.

Another option is to cross the border at Irun/Hendaye and to continue from there to your destination in Spain. Some routes run via Latour-de-Carol.

Find train schedules, ticket fares and the best routes via the given booking links.

In some cases you have to buy two tickets. One from France to Barcelona (Spain) and a second one from Barcelona to your destination in Spain. Book early to get discounts and saver fares.

2b Travelling from Irun (Spain) to Barcelona (Spain)

To travel in Spain by train, buy your ticket via one of the following booking links or at a station. Book early to get advance fares that are considerably cheaper than the full fare. Trains can get fully booked especially on weekends and routes with infrequent services. By clicking on the the booking links you find exact schedules and ticket prices. In Spain you find several night trains and interesting high-speed connections by AVE trains.
